solution_line_template: The total cost of two pairs of socks is ${sock_cost_per_pair} x {num_sock_pairs} = $<<{sock_cost_per_pair}*{num_sock_pairs}={total_sock_cost}>>{total_sock_cost}.
The total cost of the socks and the shoes is ${total_sock_cost} + ${shoe_cost} = $<<{total_sock_cost}+{shoe_cost}={total_cost_items}>>{total_cost_items}.
